title: 44 Minutes: The North Hollywood Shoot-Out
actors: Michael Madsen, Ron Livingston, Ray Baker, Douglas Spain
plot: On 28 February 1997, two men heavily armed with AK-47 try to heist the Bank of America of North Hollywood, but their plan fails and they are kept under siege by the LAPD. Along forty-four minutes, Los Angeles witnesses live on television one of the greatest shoot-out of the American history.
awards: Nominated for 2 Primetime Emmys. Another 2 nominations.
name: 44 Minutes: The North Hollywood Shoot-Out
